external_references.description: Asheer Malhotra, Jungsoo An, Kendall Mc. (2022, May 5). Mustang Panda deploys a new wave of malware targeting Europe. Retrieved August 4, 2025.
Dex. (n.d.). New Mustang Panda’s campaing against Australia. Retrieved August 4, 2025.
Nick Dai, Vickie Su, Sunny Lu. (2022, November 18). Earth Preta Spear-Phishing Governments Worldwide. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [PUBLOAD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1228) has created scheduled tasks to maintain persistence with the command `schtasks.exe /F /Create /TN Microsoft_Licensing /sc minute /MO 1 /TR C:\\Users\\Public\\Libraries\...`(Citation: Cisco Talos MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX PUBLOAD MAY 2022)(Citation: Lab52 MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD MAY 2023)(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload)
